Description: SADOWSKY ELECTRIC NYLON GUITAR w/ CUSTOM MOLDED CASE SER.# 3131 ( MINT ) SADOWSKY NYC ELECTRIC NYLON GUITAR w/ CUSTOM MOLDED CASE SER.# 3131/ c. 1999 ( MINT ) Click images to enlarge Description SADOWSKY NYC ELECTRIC NYLON GUITAR w/ CUSTOM MOLDED CASE SER.# 3131/ c. 1999 ( MINT ) We will be glad to combine shipping on as many items as you want. Up for auction we have this Sadowsky NYC Electric Nylon guitar in mint condition. There are no scratches, cracks or chipping on the finish of this guitar. The guitar has been tested and plays well, the strings have been loosened to leave the tension off for shipping. The serial number is 3131.This guitar was made in 1999. The guitar stand is not included with this auction.SHIPPING WILL BE FREE TO THE LOWER 48 STATES ONLY! Here is the description from there site: The Sadowsky Electric Nylon is a chambered body instrument designed for nylon strings. Developed primarily for the electric guitarist, the neck is thin and comfortable, with just enough extra width to accommodate the nylon strings. An acoustic style bridge graces the beautiful maple top. The custom made Barbera pickup integrated into the bridge saddle is powered by a custom Sadowsky buffer preamp. The instrument lends itself to both pick and fingerstyle techniques and produces exceptional tone when going direct into a board or through a variety of amps and PA systems. It is feedback-free and is suitable for small clubs or large stadium concerts. Electric Nylon players include Earl Klugh, Pat Metheny, Lee Ritenour, Gilberto Gil, Djavan, Daryl Steurmer, John Abercrombie, John Scofield, Mike Stern, Mick Goodrick, and Keith Richards. Specifications Chambered Okoume (African Mahogany) Body Standard Grade Flame or Quilt Maple Top Maple Neck Morado Fingerboard 1 7/8 Nut Width Chrome, Black or Gold hardware Custom Barbera pickup Sadowsky buffer pre-amp Portabag case is included. +$150 for a hard case. $4700 including case Please Write for Shipping price if you live in ALASKA, HAWAII, & PUERTO RICO!!
